description: This file declares mock functions related to secure command execution, likely used for testing purposes within a C project. It defines function prototypes for secure popen, pclose, and system calls, and includes licensing information.

methods.name: v_secure_popen
methods.description: Prototype for opening a process by creating a pipe, similar to popen but presumably for secure testing purposes.

methods.name: v_secure_pclose
methods.description: Prototype for closing a stream opened by v_secure_popen.

methods.name: v_secure_system
methods.description: Prototype for executing a command in the system shell, with an interface similar to system() but possibly with added security.
